programme.title: Creepshow 3
programme.desc: This second sequel to Creepshow features five new tales of horror.

programme.title: Nightbreed
programme.desc: Boone may be a troubled young man, but his troubles are just beginning.

programme.title: Phantasm: Remastered
programme.desc: The residents of a small town have begun dying under strange circumstances, leading young Mike to investigate.

programme.title: Deadcon
programme.desc: A group of influencers must unravel the mystery behind a vengeful spirit at the biggest digital event of the year.

programme.title: Phantasm 3: Lord of the Dead
programme.desc: Mike and Reggie continue to hunt the mysterious Tall Man, discovering that the invasion has already begun.

programme.title: Plan 9 From Outer Space
programme.desc: Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" into action.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Gamera, Super Monster
programme.desc: With the intention of conquering Earth, the evil alien Zanon unleashes the biggest threat Gamera's ever faced!

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama, the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: Sweet 16
programme.desc: Melissa tries to make friends in her new town, but each of the boys she spends time with is found murdered.

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: After a prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one.

programme.title: Better Watch Out
programme.desc: While babysitting at Christmas, Ashley is forced to defend herself and the child against unwelcome intruders.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A babysitter is terrorized by the child's father who's recently escaped from a nearby psychiatric institution.
